title: Find Your Perfect Smartwatch
description: Let us help you choose the right smartwatch or fitness tracker

questions.question: What's your main goal for wearing a smartwatch or fitness tracker?

options.text: Track my health (heart rate, steps, sleep)
Get phone notifications on my wrist

questions.question: What type of phone do you have?
How comfortable are you with technology?

options.text: I want something very simple and easy
I like having lots of features to explore

questions.question: How important is long battery life to you?

options.text: Very important - I don't want to charge often
Not important - daily charging is fine

Apple Watch.title: Apple Watch
reasons: Since you have an iPhone, an Apple Watch works seamlessly with your phone
Provides comprehensive features for all your needs

products.name: Apple Watch SE 3 (GPS, 40mm)
specs: Heart rate monitoring and fall detection
products.why: The Apple Watch SE 3 is Apple's most affordable smartwatch, offering all the essential health and safety features at a great price. It's easy to use, works perfectly with your iPhone, and includes important features like fall detection.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS, 42mm)
specs: Advanced health features: ECG, blood oxygen
Up to 18 hours battery, fast charging
products.why: The latest Apple Watch with the most advanced health monitoring features. Perfect if you want the absolute best technology and most comprehensive health tracking Apple offers.

Android Smartwatch.title: Android Smartwatch
reasons: Android-compatible options work perfectly with your phone
Great for keeping track of your daily steps and basic health metrics

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch6 (40mm)
specs: Heart rate, ECG, and body composition
products.why: Samsung's flagship smartwatch with beautiful design and comprehensive health features. Especially great if you have a Samsung phone, but works with other Android devices too.

products.name: Fitbit Sense 2
specs: Stress management and body response tracking
Built-in GPS and heart rate zones
products.why: The most advanced Fitbit smartwatch with comprehensive health monitoring. Includes stress tracking, ECG, and exceptional battery life. Perfect for serious health monitoring with easy-to-understand insights.

Fitness Tracker.title: Fitness Tracker
reasons: A fitness tracker is simple to use and focuses on health tracking without overwhelming features
These options are designed to be easy to use and understand

products.name: Fitbit Charge 6
features: Heart rate, sleep, and stress tracking
Built-in GPS for walks and runs
products.why: The best fitness tracker for most people. It's small, comfortable, and has a battery that lasts all week. Perfect for tracking health and fitness simply.

products.name: Fitbit Inspire 3
features: Up to 10 days of battery life
products.why: If you want something simple that you only have to charge once every 10 days, this is it. It tracks all the basics like steps, heart rate, and sleep in a very small package.

Standalone Smartwatch.title: Standalone Smartwatch
reasons: We'll recommend options that can work without needing a smartphone
A smartwatch offers important safety features like emergency calling and fall detection

products.name: Apple Watch SE 3 (Cellular, 40mm)
features: Make calls without your phone nearby
All SE 3 health and safety features
Perfect for walks without your phone
products.why: The cellular version lets you leave your iPhone at home while still being able to make calls, get notifications, and call for help in emergencies. Great for independence and peace of mind.
